Title: "Horizon's Edge" by Mark Wolverton

"Horizon's Edge" is a scientific novel that combines elements of techno-thriller and hard science fiction. The protagonist of the story is Sam Khalid, a brilliant but troubled astrophysicist and space engineer who is recruited by a secretive government agency to work on a top-secret project.

The project, dubbed the "Quantum Drive," promises to propel human civilization to the stars in a matter of years. However, as Sam becomes increasingly involved in the project, he discovers dangerous secrets about the true intentions of the agency and the hidden dangers associated with the Quantum Drive.

As Sam races against time to decipher the mysteries of the Quantum Drive and uncover the truth behind the agency's true intentions, he must confront powerful adversaries and make difficult decisions that will determine the future of mankind. "Horizon's Edge" is a gripping and suspenseful tale of science, politics, and personal sacrifice, with a nuanced and complex protagonist at its center.
